CFComponentModifiable, org.mt4j.components.css.util.CSSStylableComponent, org.mt4j.components.interfaces.IMTComponent, org.mt4j.components.interfaces.IMTComponent3D, org.mt4j.input.IMTInputEventListener, org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.IGestureEventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
CFComponentMenu, CFComponentMenuItem, CFImage, CFMobileDeviceProxy, CFMobileDeviceProxy, CFPhotoAlbum, CFSong, CFSpinner, CFSpinner, CFTrashCan, CFTrashCan
public abstract class CFComponent
extends org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.shapes.MTRectangle
implements CFComponentModifiable

This abstract class represents a visual, interactive component on the tabletop and inherits from MTComponent (part of the MT4j-framework)
